articles.description: Batman: The Animated Series, Batman Beyond, and a number of other popular DC titles are finally heading to HBO Max in January 2021. The move comes as DC Universe prepares to become a comics-only streamer.
articles.content:
Plus a whole bunch of other DC shows and films
A number of beloved DC titles are moving from DC Universe to HBO Max on January 1st, including Batman: The Animated Series and Batman Beyond.

articles.author: Allison Hope, CNN
articles.title: Festivus, the 'Seinfeld' holiday focused on airing grievances, is for everyone this year - CNN
articles.description: During a pandemic, the "Seinfeld"-created holiday of Festivus takes on a new meaning. It's a special day reserved traditionally for those who are more apt to want to embrace their inner "bah humbug" than their Christmas spirit.
articles.content: (CNN)For those folks who may be finding that holiday cheer is harder to come by this year, there is an alternative to the cheery decking of the halls. There is an available option to celebrate a holi… [+5832 chars]
